Name: Ritual
About the game: The Ritual is a visual novel with a well-developed plot that tells the story of the heroes becoming on their own path, some of them chose to stay locked up at home, and someone to move on and contribute new life. You have to follow at once two stories that are inextricably linked, the allegories encountered along the way may shock you. Features of the game: - Dark storytelling - Atmospheric soundtrack - Original visual style
